Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada stopping what is known as the Ninja program trying to obtain weapons has just been taken on, but they have some major problems when Joe's sister is kidnapped and held hostage with only one way to save her, but also a destiny that may play right into the sinister love of the Ninjas.
